Package com.uber.rib.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InteractorBaseComponent<T extends Interactor<?,?>>
    Designates a component that can provide a specific interactor.
    InteractorComponent<P extends Presenter,T extends Interactor<P,?>>
    Designates a component that can provide a specific interactor.
    Rib.Configuration
    Responsible for app-specific riblet configuration.
    RibRefWatcher.ReferenceWatcher
    Interface for classes that watch objects.
    Worker
    Interface used when creating a manager or helper class that should be bound to an interactor's lifecycle using a binder like WorkerBinder.
    WorkerUnbinder
    API for unbinding a Worker before currently bound lifecycle has ended.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Builder<T extends Router,D>
    Responsible for building a router.
    Bundle
    Uber wrapper around Android Bundle to avoid Android and Robolectric dependencies.
    EmptyPresenter
    No-op Presenter
    Interactor<P,R extends Router>
    The base implementation for all Interactors.
    InteractorAndViewModule<I extends Interactor,V extends android.view.View>
    A module that takes an interactor and a view as dependencies.
    InteractorModule<I extends Interactor>
    A module that takes an interactor as a dependency.
    Presenter
    Contains presentation logic.
    Rib
    Holds configuration and settings for riblets.
    RibRefWatcher
    Used to watch objects in order to verify they have no inbound references.
    Router<I extends Interactor,C extends InteractorBaseComponent>
    Responsible for handling the addition and removal of children routers.
    WorkerBinder
    Helper class to bind to an interactor's lifecycle to translate it to a Worker lifecycle.
    WorkerScopeProvider
    ScopeProvider for Worker instances.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Initializer
    Drop-in replacement for com.facebook.infer.annotation.Initializer.
    RibBuilder
    The annotation to mark that some object is an Builder.
    RibInteractor
    The annotation to mark that some object is an Interactor.
